attributes.action: Reduce curriculum content for year 13s who will be sitting exams in summer 2021
attributes.additional_details: It is not fair, due to the fact that we have had schools and teaching shut down due to the corona virus that there are no changes being made to what needs to be revised. We are not asking for the exams to be cancelled, but we are asking for more fairness and sympathy.
attributes.background: To take legal action, and to come into a fair and just decision into reducing the amount of exam content the y13s need to revise for summer 2021
